name: Heaven VS Hell Tennis (Pixel Sprouts, torpedrogames, eatcarrots)
name_original: Heaven VS Hell Tennis (Pixel Sprouts, torpedrogames, eatcarrots)
description:
Heaven plays against hell in the ultimate tennis match!

...and planet earth is the game ball...

This game is based on our first game jam entry initially created for Mini Jam 70: Heaven. You can play the original game we submitted for the jam here.

Controls

1 Player mode:

  • W/S or up/down to move paddle
  • space/enter to start ball

2 Player mode: 

  • player one: W/S to move paddle
  • player two: up/down to move paddle
  • both players: space/enter to start ball

Browser specifics:

  • you need to click into the game window once to activate keyboard controls
  • after switching to full screen you need to click into the window again

Note: This game does NOT have touch controls... sorry :(

Install instructions

On MacOS: Use right click to open the .dmg file. Confirm the dialog by pressing the open button.

On Windows: Unzip the download. Copy the included .exe and .pck files wherever you want. Make sure to always keep these two files in the same folder!

Tools & Credits

Colors: Indecision Palette created by Nelson SMG for the PixelJoint 17 Color Palette Competition (2019).
